"Xiera": "Weak Bullet is an important skill. Think of it as your trump card against boss enemies."
"However, Weak Bullet can only be placed on <red>1 part per enemy<c>! Be careful about overwriting it!"
"Weak Bullet can place weak points on parts that wouldn't normally be weak points, or it can make existing weak points even weaker. Please remember these two uses."
"Next, let's learn about Launchers and \"over-the-shoulder view\"."
